Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to state contracts being only with internet service providers compliant with net neutrality
Summary: Enacts the "NYS net neutrality protection act"; relates to state contracts being only with internet service providers compliant with net neutrality; prohibits the purchase of internet services from a non-net neutral source of internet services; requires certain disclosures by internet providers.
LawCode: Amd ยง5, Pub Serv L; amd ยง165, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the state finance law, in relation to state contracts being only with internet service providers compliant with net neutrality
